CustomField.description: Precision of the latitude and longitude coordinates used to map this business address. An accuracy of 1-3 is a very precise map location. An accuracy of 4-8 is less precise and may affect the quality of the distance measurements or geographical area assignments such as County, MSA or Boundary Central Office.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Precision of the latitude and longitude coordinates used to map this business address. An accuracy of 1-3 is a very precise map location. An accuracy of 4-8 is less precise.
CustomField.label: Accuracy
